Name: gridIconDDLColumns
DisplayName: Table (w/ Option to replace drop-down list property values/columns with icons)
Description: Simple grid view, table based, with the additional option of adding icons for specified drop-down list values

Options.Description: Enter the script name of the drop-down list property you wish to replace the values with icons

Enter the value : image pairs, 
e.g.: {"options":[{"value":"Y", "image":"Y.png" }, {"value":"N", "image":"N.png" }]}
